arStrings.szText: Upon collecting {c_important}{u}Crackling Energy{/u}{/c}, there's a {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 0"|%|]{/c} chance to release a lightning nova, dealing {c_random}[Affix_Flat_Value_1]{/c} Lightning damage, increased by {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 1"|%x|]{/c} for every {c_number}[Affix."Static Value 2"]{/c} Intelligence you have.
